source_objects.title: 3D & Animation
source_objects.description: Learn the XYZ of 3D and animation design using Autodesk Maya, Revit, Adobe After Effects, and more.

items.title: 3D Printing Business Secrets: From Modeling to Marketing
items.headline: Connect 3D creation with selling. Learn modeling and marketing without investment, experience, or a website!
objectives_summary: Learning quick 3D modeling
How to make nice presentation of your work
Designing furniture and interior space

items.title: Learn ZBrush: Easy & Fun Character 3D Sculpt Modeling
items.headline: The Basics of ZBrush - Stylized Chick Modeling and Surfacing for Beginners
objectives_summary: Think critically about character design and the pipeline for designing appealing character models.

items.title: Humanoid Rigging For Games Using Houdini And KineFX

visible_instructors.title: Simon Hayes
visible_instructors.job_title: Animator Rigger and Indie Game Developer
visible_instructors.name: Simon

items.headline: Building a humanoig game rig with kineFX.
objectives_summary: We will create a basic humanoid rig in houdini.

items.title: How to animate a basic shot ?
items.headline: Learn from an animation supervisor how to animate a shot in the production of a feature film
objectives_summary: At the end of the course you will know how to animate a shot with a professional quality
You will understand what the are keys and how to use them
You will understand the whole process of an animation

items.title: Create Glass Effect Video Slideshow in Adobe After Effects
items.headline: Make a slideshow for photos or videos with sliding glass using  After Effects -  After Effects Project File Included
objectives_summary: LEARN the techniques which you could then build on and create your own Glass Pane Slideshows style using Adobe After Effects .
CREATE a slideshow for photos or videos with sliding glass panes moving over and magnifying footage and text Easily using Adobe After Effects .
GET the After Effects project file and the necessary assets to work along with .

items.title: Mastering AutoCAD Civil 3D: Working with corridors
items.headline: This course will bring your corridor modelling skills from beginner level to intermediate/advanced.
objectives_summary: A summary overview of the components in a corridor and the workflow to join them together.
Traditional and non-traditional innovative examples of using corridors on design projects.
Tips and tricks to maximise drawing performance, increase usability, and allow easy changes.

items.title: The Complete Vray 5 for Sketchup Course for Kitchen Design
items.headline: Become an Expert in Rendering and Post-Production with Vray 5 for Sketchup by rendering a Modern Kitchen Scene.
objectives_summary: Learn to leverage Vray 5 for Sketchup to create Photorealistic Renders that will leave your clients in awe!
Understand Vray lighting, materials, settings, render elements & more to create amazing Photorealistic Renders
Learn to use the latest features in Vray like the Vray Light Mix to further adjust your lights

items.title: Interior archviz in MODO | vol.2: rendering
items.headline: Texture, light and render your interior scene in MODO
objectives_summary: Create materials from scratch
Produce physically correct metal materials
UV mapping the easy way

items.title: Solidworks Animation and Motion Analysis
items.headline: Solidworks 3D animation and analysis of mechanism
objectives_summary: sketch, features, welding, motion analysis , simiulation, rendering and much more
plotting graph in solidworks
trace path in solidwork

items.title: Paint and prep training in Nuke : fundamental - NK101
items.headline: A step by step course; Learning Nuke Fundamentals and Essential Guide for Paint prep Artist to Break into Vfx Industry
objectives_summary: Fundamentals of Nuke as paint prep Artist
Nuke's User Interface
Denoising Workflow

items.title: How to Create a Realistic Draw-On Effect in After Effects
items.headline: The guide to creating a realistic drawing animation in After Effects through 2D Animation
objectives_summary: Create a fully After Effects Produced Animation
Learn how to create complex objects in After Effects using shapes
Use keyframes to produce realistic movement

items.title: Super Hero Anatomy Course for Artists -The Hulk
items.headline: Learn to Sculpt Hulk like characters with super human anatomy.
objectives_summary: Super Human Anatomy
Hulk Character Sculpting
Sculpting Muscles

items.title: Maya - Character Rigging Vol. 1
items.headline: How to rig body parts of a puppet.
objectives_summary: Setting a skeleton
Managing controllers
Skinning a surface

items.title: Facial Rigging 101 - Maya 2020

items.headline: Master the tools and techniques of facial rigging for Characters using Maya
objectives_summary: Facial Rigging in Maya.
Techniques and workflow of the rigging process.

items.title: Build a Flywheel & Piston in Blender
items.headline: Learn how to model a flywheel and piston, then use Armatures and Bone to control the animation.
objectives_summary: Create a simple engine animation in two different models.
Learn how to model in Blender
Learn how to use armatures and bone to rig a model in Blender

items.title: Natron - Compositing, Keying and Rotoscoping using Natron

visible_instructors.job_title: A School for Data and Design Professionals
visible_instructors.name: Data Training
visible_instructors.title: Data Training Campus

items.headline: Learn Natron from scratch. Master Compositing, Keying, Rotoscoping, Paint and Filters in this comprehensive course
objectives_summary: This course will help you to learn about the fundamentals of node-based compositing using Natron, this course will also demonstrate the user interface of Natron along with features & applications of Natron.
This course will also help you to learn about how to import media supported in Natron and would also give you knowledge with working on the basic nodes and its parameters.
